message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You're starting strong, but I'm going for a bigger share this time!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but not that big!
You're not giving me enough, I'm going for the majority this time!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking the majority now!

I'm making a last-ditch effort, take it or leave it!
